# gx-header-row-pattern-marker

This component serves as a marker to determine when the `gx-navbar` component should switch between the `cssClass` and `headerRowPatternCssClass` classes.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Events

| Event                        | Description                                                                                                            | Type                   |
| ---------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `headerRowPatternBreakpoint` | The `headerRowPatternBreakpoint` event is fired synchronously when the control changes its visibility in the viewport. | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |

_Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)_
